summary: This module bridges the Cerebras cloud SDK with the Instructor client framework, offering utilities to generate Instructor client instances from existing Cerebras client objects (both synchronous and asynchronous). It abstracts the underlying SDK, enabling developers to interact with Cerebras models through Instructor's unified interface.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless integration of Cerebras cloud services into applications that use the Instructor library, reducing boilerplate and simplifying access to Cerebras AI models for developers.
